Your username must be of length 3 - 15 characters and alphanumeric.
Your password must be of length 8 - 20 characters and contain digits, upper and lower case letters.

Geese connects you with others in your area by creating flocks. Each flock is similar to a club being held at a specific location and you have the opportunity to share content with others within each flock. Whether you\'re creating posts, chatting, or hosting events, make sure you\'re positing quality content! Try to support each other by down voting inappropriate posts and report content that violates our rules.

As you should know, you should not post content on Geese that harms others or the community. 

1. DON'T bully others. 

2. DON'T post anyone's personal information or identity. 

3. DON'T spam others.
